description:
Minami Rena is a socially awkward Magical Girl who`s bad at expressing herself. She hides her lack of confidence by putting up a determined front, which makes it easy for her to be misunderstood by people she doesn`t know well yet. Contrary to her unsociable attitude, she likes sweets and has a childish taste when it comes to food. She is a female idol groupie.
Source: Official site
name: Minami Rena
